wikipedia_page.main: Frank Allen (5 May 1901 – 30 October 1989) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward and later as a wing half. Originally a coal miner by trade, he became a full-time footballer at the age of 24 and went on to play professionally for the next 11 years. He played for six different teams in the Football League, making over 230 league appearances in total.

response: *Frank Allen (playwright) (born 1954), Irish playwright, screenwriter, director and teacher
